content:
The best decorating style?
I'd say it's putting all your favorite things together!

My friend lives in this huge mansion,
but she still can't find that pocket watch she absentmindedly put down somewhere...

Have you tried mixing and matching different furniture?
Through redecorating,
You can make your home feel brand new!

I love your little house! Not only is it cozy,
*smiling* it's also really convenient to live in,
you can find everything you need nearby.
